intro: Polyosma retusa, commonly known as the slender polyosma, is a flowering plant native to Southeast Asia. It is a member of the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its slender, climbing stems and opposite, ovate leaves with serrated edges. It produces small, white to pale yellow flowers that are clustered in racemes. The fruit is a capsule that contains several small, dark seeds.
